title: NEW CHAMP CONCEPT
body: I guy with a sword and trowing knives. At lvl 9 or 10, the player gets to decide whether the champ should be ranged or melee. (Hes melee the first few lvls) Any ideas to add on?

replies.body:
This is the "My Immortal" of fan champ concepts.

10/10 would lol again.

I think you need to flush out...

literaly everything else about the kit...

before making one guy with  a sword and...

"trowing knives"...

whatever those are...


at least make a Q or a W or even an ultimate...

but an OUTLINE of a passive...

at least some champ passive ideas seem really creative and fun and interactive...


you just have "make yourself melee forever or make yourself ranged forever. only works at level 9 or 10"
